page.title: 05ASHTON COURT PARK
page.content: Most people think you have to go to the Alps to ski but not in Bristol.In {Ashton Court}they have grass skiing. Anyone can go young or old.Ashton court also has a public golf course for relaxation.It has a park where you can go and play on the swings and sliders.Opposite Ashton park there is the Smyth Arms you can play football or what ever you want on the many fields surrounding the MANSION.There are gardens you can go and walk round and trees you can climb.There is a footpath though the woods and the good thing is it,s all open to the public for nothing.But the council want to sell the land and make it a private golf club or hotel.
